channel.title: Longevity on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: DEXA Scan Deep Dive, With Insights From the Experts (2025)
item.description: DEXA scans measure your bone density, lean muscle, and adipose visceral tissue. But unless you’re an athlete or approaching menopause, you probably don’t need a detailed full-body scan.

item.title: Join Our Next Livestream: Inside Katie Drummond’s Viral Interview With Bryan Johnson
item.description: On July 31, WIRED’s global editorial director discusses the world of wellness—and beyond—with WIRED reporters.

item.title: Bryan Johnson Is Going to Die
item.description: Millions of dollars in treatments, supplements, and scans. Immortality through AI. Bryan Johnson’s longevity script has everything—except an ending.
